name: Livingmare Cold Calls
description:
Game Story:

One day the security software developer named Timothy accidentally captures a wild ghost. When the ghost noticed that he was being seen, It always haunts him and doesn't let him sleep. The ghost asks him for help in dreams every night it always says "Open Room L204" and the hospital image. He moved from apartment to apartment but the ghost was always following him. In the 4th month, he decided to help the ghost.

Timothy went to the place indicated by the ghost the abandoned hospital in Marikina. In the morning the police guard the building because there are always crime reports in that building. So he had no choice but to go there at night, but he does not know the danger that awaits in that abandoned hospital.

The Game Goal

Collect the pieces of paper that will lead to the clue in that hospital. Use the face detection app to detect the ghost whether it is a dangerous ghost or not. Open the Room L304. Be careful.

Features:

- Face detection: The app detects its face and ghost distance.
- Mood detection: The app detects the ghost's mood so you know if he is not harmful.
- Age detection: The app detects the ghost's age so you can identify them more easily.
- Gender detection: The app detects the ghost's age so you can identify them more easily.
- True horror: Livingmare gives you an uneasy feeling and eerie.
